result.reason: Valid UX feature request for dynamic virtual groups (Connected, Recent) that auto-populate based on connection state and usage history, improving navigation for users with large connection trees.
result.approach: Add virtual/smart group nodes to the connection tree that dynamically filter connections: 'Connected' group queries active sessions from ConnectionsService, 'Recent' group tracks last-used timestamps on ConnectionInfo and shows top N sorted by recency; both render as read-only pseudo-containers in the tree UI
